author: djrtwo
content:
Beacon chain specs `v1.1.0-alpha.5` -- The Broken Star -- released!
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/releases/tag/v1.1.0-alpha.5

This fixes a critical error in the definition of `PARTICIPATION_FLAG_WEIGHTS` identified by <@!363800010518822915> during `alpha.4` testing
